(Program 
  (Statement 
    (MethodCall 
      (ArgumentList) 
      (Call 
        (Primary 
          (Lhs 
            (MethodCall 
              (ArgumentList 
                (Arg 
                  (Primary 
                    (HeredocBeginning "<<-SQL"))))
